name: Zooo
overview:
Zooo was produced by Success in 2004.

The objective of Zooo is to remove the animal tiles that fill up the screen by aligning three or more in a row or column. Levels ends when a predetermined number of each animal tile has been removed.This game has two play modes, single player and coop two player mode. In two player mode you work together to clear the board and play for points. Pretty much an arcade version of a match-3 puzzle game, but with a two player mode
